message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $90.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your generosity. I would like to counter with an offer of $85 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. After reconsidering, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll sell the product to you for $92.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to counter with an offer of $88 for the product.
I understand you're close to your target price, Bob. I'm willing to make another adjustment. I'll sell the product to you for $91.
Thank you for your continued willingness to negotiate, Alice. I appreciate your efforts. I would like to counter with an offer of $89 for the product.
I'm getting close to my minimum, Bob. I'll make one more adjustment. I'll sell the product to you for $90.50.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your effort to meet my target price. I would like to counter with an offer of $89.5 for the product.
I'm not willing to go any higher, Bob. I'll meet you halfway between $89.5 and $90. I'll sell the product to you for $89.75.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your persistence. I would like to counter with an offer of $89.25 for the product.
